item.title: EP 55 - The Death Of A Conspiracy Theorist
item.itunes:title: The Death Of A Conspiracy Theorist
item.description:
Today we look at the life and death conspiracy theorist Max Spiers, and then I get too mad to talk about our second story.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Links:

British UFO hunter’s laptop was ‘wiped’ after mysterious death

https://metro.co.uk/2018/08/11/british-ufo-hunters-laptop-wiped-mysterious-death-7826349/

BLACK MAGIC What conspiracy theories did Max Spiers believe in and what are Dulce Base and the Fourth Reich? Here’s what we know

https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/1998060/max-spiers-conspiracy-theories-dulce-base-fourth-reich-ufo/

'SACRIFICED TO SATAN' Brit conspiracy theorist Max Spiers ‘killed by a cult who tried to deprogram him’, says devastated mum

https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/1995735/brit-conspiracy-theorist-max-spiers-killed-by-a-cult-who-tried-to-deprogramme-him-says-devastated-mum/

Project Mannequin And The Mysterious Death Of Max Spiers

https://www.ufoinsight.com/project-mannequin-mysterious-death-max-spiers/

https://supersoldierforum.ubbforum.com/topic/rip-max-spiers

Spiers’ outlandish conspiratorial claims gain new life months after his sudden death

https://doubtfulnews.com/2016/10/spiers-outlandish-conspiratorial-claims-gain-new-life-months-after-his-sudden-death/
